title: Authors and Citation
text: Loos S, Lubeck-Schricker M, Kramer S (2023). “cbssuitabilityhaiti: package contains data sanitation zoning assessment done city Cap Haitien, Haiti. combines two datasets used analysis suitability container-based sanitation (CBS).” doi:10.5281/zenodo.8361085.
code: @Misc{looslubeckschricker,   title = {cbssuitabilityhaiti: This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).},   author = {Sebastian Camilo Loos and Maya Lubeck-Schricker and Sasha Kramer},   year = {2023},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.8361085},   abstract = {What the package does (one paragraph).},   version = {0.0.1}, }

what:
This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for 
    the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis 
    of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).
title:
This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for 
    the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis 
    of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).
text: goal cbssuitabiility provide datasets research planning water solid waste management Cap Haïtien, Haiti. package combines datasets collected part two different projects. package includes geospatial data locations water access points data sanitation zoning report municipality Cap Haïtien.

previous_headings: Projet Eau et Assainissement de l’USAID
title:
This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for 
    the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis 
    of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).
text: study, based three basic criteria (physical, urban characteristics socioeconomic constraints zones), divides Cap-Haïtien metropolitan area homogeneous zones order propose adapted sanitation solutions zone based set predefined criteria.

previous_headings: Projet Eau et Assainissement de l’USAID
title:
This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for 
    the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis 
    of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).
text: data includes data sanitation zoning report done city Cap Haïtien, Haiti 2022. Additionally, contains spatial data neighborhoods 5 different Haïtien cities. attribute table includes data population density, socioeconomic status, suitability pit latrines, suggested sewage construction priority zones. data developed USAID Water Sanitation Project collaboration Cap-Haitian municipal government DINEPA. data reflect opinion USAID US Government. okap data set 13 variables 198 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

text: https://data.humdata.org/dataset/cap-haitien-haiti-sanitation-zoning-assessment

title:
This package contains data for a sanitation zoning assessment done for 
    the city of Cap Haitien, Haiti. It combines two datasets used for an analysis 
    of the suitability of container-based sanitation (CBS).
text: code example shows use data prepare map R. Find examples prepared examples article (vignette("examples")). Screenshot interactive map OpenStreetMap layer.
code: library(cbssuitabilityhaiti) library(tidyverse) library(sf) library(tmap)   ## create an interactive map for cap haitien  # set mapping mode to interactive ("view") tmap_mode("view")  # create first map layer: neighborhood areas tm_shape(filter(okap, cte == "ctecaphaitien")) +   tm_borders() +   tm_fill(alpha = 0.6) +   # create second map layer: locations and type of the water points   tm_shape(drop_na(st_join(mwater, okap), neighborho)) +   tm_dots(col = "type", palette = "PuRd")

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: data includes data sanitation zoning report done city Cap Haitien, Haiti 2022. Additionally, contains spatial data neighborhoods 5 different Haitien cities.

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: tibble 198 rows 21 variables: neighborho Unique identifying number neighborhood unit name Name nieghborhood unit sup_km2 Area neighborhood square km cte Name commune (administrative unit Haiti) economy Categorical socioeconomic status (low, medium) sup_bati_km2 area neihborhood covered buildings square kilometers density Categorical population density (least dense, somewhat dense, dense, dense, dense) aptitude suitability site wastewater treatment system zoning "group" collective grouped sanitation possible short term. latrine Suggested pit latrine septic allowance (allowed, allowed) density_ra Catgoriccal population density according description variable "density" (values 1 5) economy_nu Categotical socioeconomic status according description variable "economy" (1=low, 2 = medium) geometry Geospatial data neighborhood stored polygon

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: data developed USAID Water Sanitation Project collaboration Cap-Haitian municipal government DINEPA. data reflect opinion USAID US Government.
